exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type sum, times : X -> X -> X zero, one : X M_sum : monoid_theory sum z sum_comm : forall x y : X, x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x sum_cancel : forall x u v : X, x ⊕ u = x ⊕ v -> u = v M_times : monoid_theory times o distr_l : forall x y z : X, x ⊗ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊗ y ⊕ x ⊗ z distr_r : forall x y z : X, (y ⊕ z) ⊗ x = y ⊗ x ⊕ z ⊗ x k : nat x, y : X The term "k" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "X".
Found no subterm matching "(scal k y ⊕ y) ⊗ x" in the current goal.
Found no subterm matching "(y ⊕ scal k y) ⊗ x" in the current goal.

In environment X : Type sum, times : X -> X -> X zero, one : X M_sum : monoid_theory sum z sum_comm : forall x y : X, x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x sum_cancel : forall x u v : X, x ⊕ u = x ⊕ v -> u = v M_times : monoid_theory times o distr_l : forall x y z : X, x ⊗ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊗ y ⊕ x ⊗ z distr_r : forall x y z : X, (y ⊕ z) ⊗ x = y ⊗ x ⊕ z ⊗ x k : nat x, y : X Unable to unify "x ⊗ scal k y" with "scal k (x ⊗ y)".

original: rewrite (distr_l k x y y). rewrite (distr_r x (scal k y) y). rewrite (distr_r x y (scal k y)). reflexivity.
